text: alm tru- 'ayuha alnas- 'ana allah dhllal lakum maa fi alsmwat min alshams walqamar walsahab waghayr dhlk, wama fi al'ard min aldwabb walshajar walma', waghayr dhlk mimma la yhsa, wemmakm bnemh alzzahirat ealaa alabdan waljwarh, walbatnt fi aleqwl walqlwb, wama addakhrh lakum mimma la telmwnh? wamin alnaas man yujadil fi tawhid allah w'ikhlas alebadt lah bighayr hujat wala byan, wala kitab mubin ybyin hqyqt dewah
